original_text: saying, “The Son of Man must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be killed, and on the third day be raised.”
korean_text: 이르시되 인자가 많은 고난을 받고 장로들과 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 버린 바 되어 죽임을 당하고 제삼일에 살아나야 하리라 하시고

sentences.original_text: “The Son of Man must suffer many things
and be rejected by the elders and chief priests and scribes,
and on the third day be raised.”
